name: Breaking Bad: The Meth of Truth
name_original: Breaking Bad: The Meth of Truth
description:
Breaking Bad: The Meth of Truth is a short, unofficial Breaking Bad fan game made by yours truly.

You play as Walter White, accompanied by Jesse Pinkman, Saul Goodman and Mike Ehrmantraut, and you guys are on a mission to take down an ancient evil who has possessed a powerful object.

 this was done just for fun so please don't sue me AMC
